argument.name: Key_Ptr
argument.description: A pointer to an existing index entry.

page.description: Repeats Find_by_Form, finding the next record.
page.discussion: The .FIND_NEXT() method finds and returns the key after the specified key.
page.example: dim tbl as P dim qry as P dim ptr as P tbl = table.open("test") query.filter = "ID <> ''" query.options = "" qry = tbl.query_create() ptr = qry.find_first() ? qry.find_next(ptr) = Key = "11111-02" Record = 2
